LanguageData.Ind_MiningHole.label: mining hole
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker.label: Skydriller callmaker
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker.description: Summons the skydriller, a low orbit plasma driller. The skydriller will fire a plasma beam on the coordinates of the callmaker, creating a deep mining hole and destroying the callmaker in the process. A colonist must be selected and ordered to active the callmaker. NOTE: The signal of the callmaker is blocked inside caves and structures so must be placed outside.
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker_Calling.label: Skydriller callmaker (active)
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker_Calling.descript: Summons the skydriller, a low orbit plasma driller. The skydriller will fire a plasma beam on the coordinates of the callmaker, creating a deep mining hole and destroying the callmaker in the process. A colonist must be selected and ordered to active the callmaker. NOTE: The signal of the callmaker is blocked inside caves and structures so must be placed outside.
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker_Drilling.label: Skydriller drilling (active)
LanguageData.Ind_SkydrillerCallmaker_Drilling.descrip: Plasma drilling in progress. Clear the area!!!
